title: Kemono ni Narenai Watashitachi
overview: 30-year-old Akira Shinkai always smiles and she is perfect at work. She cares about those around her too much. 33-year-old Kosei Nemoto works as an accountant. He is friendly and popular among women. Nevertheless, he dos not trust anyone and he does not fall in love easily. Akira Shinkai and Kosei Nemoto meet at a bar and become attracted to each other.
